data.event: Clinton grew rapidly during the 1990s and continues to see rapid growth, with an estimated population of 21,104 in 2014.

event.title: began in the area of Clinton in 1879

data.event: Dry farming began in the area of Clinton in 1879.

event.title: 1884 the Summit Basin Branch of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints was organized

data.event: In 1884 the Summit Basin Branch of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints was organized in Clinton.

event.title: was organized in Clinton in May 1897

data.event: A ward was organized in Clinton in May 1897, which was named Clinton.
